title: Advanced routers
pageDescription: Managing advanced routers in the Cloud Networks service.
shortDescription: Creating and editing an advanced router, managing interfaces, static and dynamic routs
markdown: Managing advanced routers in the Cloud Networks service. Advanced routers are only available with [SDN Sprut](../../concepts/architecture#ispolzuemye_sdn). To find out which SDN is used in your project or to connect another, contact [technical support](/en/contacts).
